scenes.background: After agreeing to take a quick look at the urgent task while on leave, you find that the task is more complicated than initially described. As you begin to work on it, [Monica] and [Bob] start messaging you.
scenes.description: 'Hey, do you think you can finish this by the end of the day? Bob and I are swamped with other tasks.'

options.text: I'm really not sure if I can commit to that right now.
options.analysis: You express uncertainty, showing balanced emotional perception and social skills, but your motivation and self-regulation could be higher.

options.text: I'll do my best to get it done, but I can't guarantee it.
options.analysis: You show a willingness to help, demonstrating good self-regulation and motivation, but empathy and social skill could be improved.

options.text: I think it would be better if you find someone else who can dedicate more time to this task.
options.analysis: You prioritize effective task management and show good emotional perception and empathy, but self-regulation and social skill could be higher.
